refnamediv.refpurpose: Contains the unique numeric error code of the last executed SAM operation.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Contains the numeric error code of the last executed SAM operation on this connection. If the last operation completed successfully this property contains 0.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
An integer greater than zero indicates the last error type encountered on the connection. Zero indicates that the last operation on this connection completed successfully.
